1109127373415305217.text:
The Maker Foundation Interim Risk Team has placed an Executive Vote proposal into the voting system to enact a new Dai Stability Fee of 7.5%. The Executive Vote is now live at http://vote.makerdao.com . 
More info below:https://blog.makerdao.com/executive-vote-stability-fee-of-7-5/ …

1108712042054193152.text: Looks like more MKR has voted in the current @MakerDAO governance poll ending in 5 hours -- Over 5.3% of MKR voting... this is actually over 25% more than the last vote which was around 4% of MKR voting #ethereumpic.twitter.com/Akg2dIUN1k

1107716446514081792.text:
The Interim Risk Team has placed three proposals into the voting system to raise the Dai Stability Fee by 0%, 2%, or 4%.

Please visit http://vote.makerdao.com/polling  to vote, or go to https://www.reddit.com/r/MakerDAO/comments/b2m7yl/governance_poll_proposed_stability_fee_increases/ … to discuss.

1105584836780195840.text: The gap has been closing over time and @MakerDAO 3.5% stability fee has overtaken @compoundfinance loan supply rate. Supply volume has dropped, borrow volume improving slightly. May be early indication that increasing the stab fee has slowed the oversupply problem.pic.twitter.com/hk5B7z3DnX

1100153480050728960.text:
Some interesting facts about @MakerDAO: 

20% monthly growth in both holders and active addresses

retention rate of 42% of users over the lifetime of the protocol

16% of new addresses start out by receiving more than 1,000 Dai

71% spend Dai within the first week.

Visualize your (or anyone else's) liquidation price using the management widget by adjusting the parameters. Metamask/Web3 is not required. #makerdao #dai #ethpic.twitter.com/cvn4VX1OFq

1121719021949161477.text:
We're happy to announce some updates for Dai Embassy!
Two new tables have been added:
(1)Significant CDP Actions (large $DAI and PETH transactions)
(2)Liquidations 
As a bonus, you can now search for @MakerDAO CDPs by address, in addition to their ID.

http://daiembassy.online pic.twitter.com/Aze4ck8xrw

1116688164041576450.text: Looks very nice! Lots of relevant info presented at a glance.https://twitter.com/DigixOrg/status/1116679977976647682 …

1114101196422127616.text: In this same period, among all MakerDAO CDPs, locked $ETH increased by only 7,000 (~1.14M USD equiv.) indicating that much of the new $DAI has been created from previously locked collateral, given a minimum 150% collateralization ratio. More than 10M DAI can still be created.pic.twitter.com/e83edwYnMU

1114101194518028289.text: Over the past three days, 1,070 draw actions have occurred on #MakerDAO CDPs, increasing $DAI supply by 3.02M. Only 415 wipe actions have occurred, suggesting that many speculators are still not deterred by the stability fee (7.5%) during periods of rapid $ETH price appreciation.pic.twitter.com/HSu6Z4eStF

1112855494698315777.text: We have published a minor update to the site to include a table showing all CDP actions since @MakerDAO began. Interesting fact: over 100,300 actions (open, lock, draw, wipe, bite, etc.) have been conducted on CDPs since Dec 18/2017.pic.twitter.com/qYfmyK12dp

1110088816570728448.text: Some #MakerDAO stats: There are over 13,500 open CDPs, 3,287 of which are collateralized. The average collateralization is 558 $ETH (median 6), while the average debt is 27,145 $DAI (median 425). An average of 28 CDPs have been opened every day in March.pic.twitter.com/l1BLFD0399

1109291438968193025.text: The @MakerDAO Stability Fee has been increased by 4% from 3.5% to 7.5%. Circulating $DAI, which peaked at 95M, has been reduced to 91M during the lead up to this change. Over 5.1M in debt has been repaid over the last four days. DAI price responding: https://dai.stablecoin.science/ pic.twitter.com/YfDhSv3Tnf

1104210478090223616.text: The #MakerDAO stability fee is now 3.5%. It will be interesting to see if there is a levelling off or decline of the yellow line (circulating $DAI) in this chart.pic.twitter.com/yhbqBgpigS

1102388556255748096.text: This past week in @MakerDAO: more than 210 CDPs were created (~30/day), 158 of which are collateralized. Total locked collateral is up 39.5k to 2.13M #ETH. Debt issuance is levelling off, increasing by 1.4M #DAI (partly due to stability fee increase?). #MKR held onto recent gainspic.twitter.com/gZel2EgeMc

1100926074882449408.text: We have added two new charts showing daily historical PETH collateralization (green), #DAI debt (red), and liquidation price (yellow) of @MakerDAO CDPs. These charts are fully interactive and are available for any of the 12k+ open CDPs.pic.twitter.com/XCo9asKQqP

1100561869624946688.text: 2% of the #ETH supply (2,101,263 ETH or 2,018,698 PETH) is now locked in @MakerDAO. We will be tweeting about 4% locked in < 6 months (our guess). Complete stats at https://www.daiembassy.online/

1099846048514625536.text: Some @MakerDAO updates: There are have been over 12,836 CDPs opened, 2885 of which have > 0.01 DAI debt. The PETH/ETH ratio has crept up from 1.0404 to 1.0409 due to liquidations. 88.2M #DAI is circulating (11.8M away from debt ceiling). #MKR price up 20% on the week (USD).pic.twitter.com/3qhjbyet6w

1097478223099641856.text: The complete daily history of PETH deposits (green) and PETH withdrawals (red) from @MakerDAO shows deposits to the platform, which recently surpassed 2M #ETH, significantly outpacing withdrawals in magnitude. On average, a CDP holds 478 PETH (497 ETH) in collateral.pic.twitter.com/qpCNhVbfLU

1092945615355428864.text: 1.937% of the #ETH supply is now locked in @MakerDAO, whose system collateralization is 280.66%. This means that there is over 214 million USD locked as collateral for the 76 million USD of debt held by CDPs. #DeFi is an upgrade of the gold standard for the 21st century.

1090842759458484224.text: There is now more than 2 million $ETH locked in @MakerDAO. Congratulations to all the participants of #DeFi!pic.twitter.com/GLX9kUuRWd

1088241862727462912.text: The complete daily history of DAI repayment (green) and DAI creation (red) from @MakerDAO shows total circulating #DAI (yellow) increasing throughout 2018, despite the bear market, suggesting that demand for a permissionless, trustless, decentralized, auditable stablecoin exists.pic.twitter.com/BVh2cBVi3C

1087147316325244928.text: Of the 11,868 @MakerDAO CDPs, 2258 have at least 0.01 #DAI debt. The average collateralization of these CDPs is 541 #ETH (520 PETH), while their average debt is 31,998 DAI. Nearly 2M ETH is locked in MakerDAO (currently 1.92M ETH or 1.85M PETH) representing 1.844% of supply.pic.twitter.com/NkwGs3dfE9

1086239793866928130.text: Over the past 365 days, the average daily closing price of #DAI was $1.005 USD. In this period, market capitalization increased 62.3M from 9.03M to 71.4M USD. Since the @MakerDAO Stability Fee reduction of 2% on Dec 21, mcap has increased by 12.9M. #DeFi is picking up pace!pic.twitter.com/ff7OLIisSr

1085321245162319872.text: We have released an update to decrease load times and improve site performance. Instantly sort and filter all 11,000+ #MakerDAO CDPs by their $DAI debt, $ETH collateral, and more. Click a CDP ID to get it's latest statistics from the blockchain.pic.twitter.com/XCcAzPhS16

1083212468673863680.text: Adoption of @MakerDAO has been accelerating in recent months. CDP draw actions (creating #DAI) reached ATH on Dec 24, with 389 separate draw actions occurring (YTD high 262). The ATH for locking(depositing) #ETH occured on Nov 20 with 537 lock actions occurring (YTD high 196).pic.twitter.com/Lo5O5gDudI

1082264130008956929.text: Over the past three months, the average number of CDPs created daily (blue) on @MakerDAO has increased from 11 to 18. Furthermore, in this period, the average daily CDP interactions(green) have nearly doubled from 155 to 306, with lock #ETH and draw #DAI occuring most frequently.pic.twitter.com/1SfZw6JgkU

1080991136204767234.text: The top 10 CDPs (0.25%) by collateralization account for 43.7% or 753K #ETH locked in @MakerDAO. These CDPs have created 42.8% (30M) of the 70.2M #DAI in circulation. Cumulatively, they have accrued 77.9K DAI in fees (0.26% of their debt).pic.twitter.com/ZVRGfNHG38

1079724866553536512.text: Visualize the liquidation characteristics of any #MakerDAO CDP in real time by simulating the addition or removal of #ETH or #DAI. Demonstrated with community favorite CDP 3228.pic.twitter.com/EBGGHHRHGY

1078077418802315264.text: Since Dec 20, the number of CDPs opened on @MakerDAO has increased by more than 160 to 3789.  In this period, the average collateralization has increased from 461 to 480 #ETH and the average debt has increased from 15,845 to 17,790 #DAI.pic.twitter.com/N8rxC4XAHN

1075872937113075713.text: The average debt for all open CDPs (total 3624) is 15,845 $DAI. The average collateral held by a CDP is 444 PETH (461 ETH). Over 1.6M ETH (1.619% of circulating supply) is now locked in Maker's smart contracts. View more CDP stats @DaiEmbassy alpha. Made with for @MakerDAO.

1072985474904379392.text: There have been more than 5050 CDPs created with #makerdao. 3504 of them are still open, and over 1300 CDPs have at least 0.01 #dai debt. View more stats and CDPs on @DaiEmbassy
